text: Nino Alberto Arbasino (22 January 1930 â€“ 23 March 2020) was an Italian writer, essayist, and politician. He was a Member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1983 to 1987. Arbasino was a member of the Italian Republican Party. Arbasino was born in Voghera, Lombardy, Italy. Arbasino died of a long-illness on 23 March 2020 in Voghera, Lombardy at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== *Files about his parliamentary activities (in Italian): IX legislature. title: Alberto Arbasino
